- [93mSuicide[0m [93mdeaths[0m among [93mdentists[0m in the [93mUnited[0m [93mStates[0m.: [93mBackground[0m: [93mDentists[0m [93mexperience[0m [93mmyriad[0m [93moccupational[0m [93mstressors[0m and are [93mknown[0m to [93mhave[0m an [93melevated[0m [93mrisk[0m of [93msuicide[0m. [93mPrevious[0m [93mUS[0m [93mstudies[0m [93mfocused[0m on [93msuicide[0m among [93mWhite[0m [93mmale[0m [93mdentists[0m, and [93mall[0m [93mstudies[0m were [93mpublished[0m before [93m2000[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93maimed[0m to [93massess[0m [93msuicide[0m [93mmortality[0m among [93mmale[0m and [93mfemale[0m [93mUS[0m [93mdentists[0m, to [93mevaluate[0m [93mmethods[0m of [93msuicide[0m, and to [93mexamine[0m [93mtrends[0m over [93mtime[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mData[0m on [93mUS[0m [93mdentists[0m who [93mdied[0m from [93m1979[0m through [93m2018[0m were [93mprovided[0m by the [93mAmerican[0m [93mDental[0m [93mAssociation[0m and [93mmatched[0m to the [93mNational[0m [93mDeath[0m [93mIndex[0m. [93mDecedents[0m who [93mdied[0m by [93mintentional[0m [93mself[0m-[93mharm[0m were [93midentified[0m, and [93mproportionate[0m [93mmortality[0m [93mratios[0m ([93mPMRs[0m) [93mindirectly[0m [93mstandardized[0m for [93mage[0m, [93msex[0m, [93mrace[0m, and [93m5[0m-[93myear[0m [93mcalendar[0m [93mperiod[0m with [93m95[0m% [93mCIs[0m were [93mcalculated[0m [93musing[0m the [93mLife[0m [93mTable[0m [93mAnalysis[0m [92mSystem[0m ([93mNational[0m [93mInstitute[0m for [93mOccupational[0m [93mSafety[0m and [93mHealth[0m). [93mSuicide[0m [93mmethods[0m and [93mtrends[0m over [93mtime[0m were [93malso[0m [93manalyzed[0m. [93mResults[0m: Of [93m21[0m,[93m928[0m [93meligible[0m [93mdecedent[0m [93mrecords[0m, [93m475[0m ([93m2[0m.[93m2[0m%) [93mdeaths[0m were [93mcaused[0m by [93msuicide[0m, with [93mPMRs[0m of [93m2[0m.[93m01[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m, [93m1[0m.[93m83[0m to [93m2[0m.[93m21[0m; [93mP[0m < .[93m001[0m) for [93mmale[0m [93mdentists[0m and [93m2[0m.[93m15[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m, [93m1[0m.[93m23[0m to [93m3[0m.[93m49[0m; [93mP[0m = .[93m009[0m) for [93mfemale[0m [93mdentists[0m. [93mFirearms[0m were the [93mpredominant[0m [93msuicide[0m [93mmethod[0m for [93mmale[0m [93mdentists[0m ([93m61[0m.[93m4[0m%), but [93mfemale[0m [93mdentists[0m were [93msplit[0m between [93mfirearms[0m ([93m31[0m.[93m3[0m%) and [93mhangings[0m ([93m31[0m.[93m3[0m%). [93mPMRs[0m for [93msuicide[0m [93mincreased[0m [93msteadily[0m for [93mmale[0m and [93mfemale[0m [93mdentists[0m since [93m1995[0m. [93mConclusions[0m: From [93m1979[0m through [93m2018[0m, [93mUS[0m [93mmale[0m and [93mfemale[0m [93mdentists[0m [93mexhibited[0m [93mhigher[0m [93msuicide[0m [93mmortality[0m than the [93mgeneral[0m [93mpopulation[0m, with a [93msteady[0m [93mincrease[0m since [93m1995[0m. [93mPractical[0m [93mimplications[0m: [93mDentist[0m [93msuicide[0m [93mprevention[0m [93mresources[0m [93mmay[0m be [93mbeneficial[0m, [93mparticularly[0m [93maddressing[0m [93moccupational[0m [93mstressors[0m. [93mReducing[0m [93mstigma[0m and [93menhancing[0m [93maccess[0m to [93mmental[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mservices[0m [93mcould[0m [93mlessen[0m the [93mrisk[0m of [93msuicide[0m for [93mdental[0m [93mcare[0m [93mprofessionals[0m.

- [93mHuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93mcases[0m [93mreported[0m to [93mhealth[0m [93mfacilities[0m in the [93mVolta[0m [93mregion[0m of [93mGhana[0m, [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m.: [93mIntroduction[0m: [93mAlthough[0m [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m [93moccur[0m [93mless[0m [93mfrequently[0m than [93mother[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93minjuries[0m, [93mthey[0m [93mpresent[0m [93mnotable[0m [93mpublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mchallenges[0m, [93myet[0m [93mthey[0m [93mhave[0m [93mreceived[0m [93mrelatively[0m [93mlittle[0m [93mattention[0m. This [93mstudy[0m [93mexamined[0m the [93mincidence[0m, [93mtrend[0m, and [93mdistribution[0m of [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m in the [93mVolta[0m [93mRegion[0m of [93mGhana[0m from [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m. [93mMethod[0m: A [93mretrospective[0m [93manalysis[0m of [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjury[0m [93mdata[0m from the [93mDistrict[0m [93mHealth[0m [93mInformation[0m [33mManagement[0m [92mSystem[0m [93m2[0m ([93mDHIMS[0m-[93m2[0m) for the [93mVolta[0m [93mRegion[0m was [93mconducted[0m for the [93mperiod[0m [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m. [93mData[0m on [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m were [93mobtained[0m from the [93mmonthly[0m [93moutpatient[0m ([93mOPD[0m) [93mmorbidity[0m [93mreport[0m [93mform[0m. [93mVariables[0m [93mavailable[0m and [93mextracted[0m were [93mage[0m, [93msex[0m, [93mdistrict[0m and [93myear[0m of [93mreport[0m. The [93mdata[0m was [93manalyzed[0m [93mdescriptively[0m [93musing[0m [93mMicrosoft[0m [93mExcel[0m and [93mQuantum[0m [93mGeographic[0m [93mInformation[0m [92mSystem[0m ([93mQGIS[0m) and the [93mfindings[0m [93mpresented[0m in [93mtables[0m and [93mgraphs[0m. [93mResult[0m: A [93mtotal[0m of [93m931[0m [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m were [93mreported[0m to [93mhealth[0m [93mfacilities[0m from [93m2019[0m to [93m2023[0m, with the [93mhighest[0m [93mincidence[0m of [93m12[0m.[93m0[0m [93mper[0m [93m100[0m,[93m000[0m [93mrecorded[0m in [93m2021[0m and the [93mlowest[0m, [93m9[0m.[93m7[0m [93mper[0m [93m100[0m,[93m000[0m in [93m2019[0m. [93mMales[0m and [93myoung[0m [93madults[0m between the [93mages[0m of [93m18[0m-[93m34[0m [93maccounted[0m for [93m58[0m.[93m1[0m and [93m41[0m.[93m1[0m%, [93mrespectively[0m of [93mall[0m [93mcases[0m [93mreported[0m. [93mGeographically[0m, [93mKetu[0m [93mNorth[0m [93mrecorded[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mnumber[0m of [93mcases[0m, [93m184[0m ([93m19[0m.[93m8[0m%). [93mThere[0m [93mwe[0m no [93mreported[0m [93mdeath[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mhuman[0m [93mbite[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mHuman[0m [93mbite[0m [93minjuries[0m in the [93mVolta[0m [93mRegion[0m [93mhave[0m [93mshown[0m an [93mupward[0m [93mtrend[0m over the [93myears[0m [93mstudied[0m, with [93mmales[0m and [93myoung[0m [93madults[0m [93maged[0m [93m18[0m to [93m34[0m [93myears[0m [93maffected[0m in the [93mmajority[0m of the [93mreported[0m [93mcases[0m. While the [93mcauses[0m and [93minfection[0m [93moutcomes[0m were not [93mdetermined[0m, this [93mstudy[0m [93mprovides[0m [93messential[0m [93mbaseline[0m [93mdata[0m for [93mfurther[0m [93mresearch[0m into the [93mcauses[0m and [93meffects[0m of these [93minjuries[0m.

and [93mpercentages[0m, with [93mtreatments[0m over [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m% of the [93mtotal[0m [93mclassified[0m as [93mcommon[0m. [93mStatistical[0m [93manalyses[0m [93mincluded[0m [93msignificant[0m). [93mCommonly[0m [93mused[0m [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m were [93mcross[0m-[93mreferenced[0m with the [93mMOH[0m [93mdrug[0m [93mdatabase[0m for [93mregistration[0m and [93mreimbursement[0m [93mstatus[0m. [93mResults[0m: A [93mtotal[0m of [93m3[0m,[93m284[0m [93mcompassionate[0m [93mtreatments[0m were [93madministered[0m, [93memploying[0m [93m596[0m [93mdistinct[0m [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m to [93maddress[0m [93m1[0m,[93m361[0m [93mconditions[0m in [93m2020[0m-[93m2024[0m. [93mTemporal[0m [93manalysis[0m [93midentified[0m a [93mpeak[0m in [93m2020[0m, which [93maccounted[0m for [93m24[0m% of [93mtotal[0m [93mtreatments[0m, [93mfollowed[0m by a [93mdecrease[0m [93mthereafter[0m. [93mPatient[0m [93mage[0m [93mstratification[0m [93mindicated[0m that those [93maged[0m [93m65[0m to [93m80[0m [93mreceived[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mtreatment[0m [93mproportion[0m ([93m26[0m%), while the [93m45[0m to [93m65[0m [93mage[0m [93mgroup[0m [93maccounted[0m for [93m19[0m%. [93mTreatments[0m were [93mmainly[0m [93mshowing[0m the [93mleast[0m [93musage[0m. The [93mauthorization[0m [93mprocess[0m was [93mprimarily[0m for the [93mcontinuation[0m of [93mstudy[0m [93mdrug[0m in [93m63[0m% of [93mcases[0m. [93mAdditionally[0m, [93mBelantamab[0m [93mmafodotin[0m and [93mTrametinib[0m were the [93mmost[0m [93mfrequently[0m [93mutilized[0m [93mmedicinal[0m [93mproducts[0m, [93maccounting[0m for [93m9[0m% and [93m8[0m.[93m6[0m% of [93mtreatments[0m, [93mrespectively[0m. [93mDisease[0m [93mcategory[0m [93manalysis[0m [93mrevealed[0m that [93mrelapsed[0m [93mrefractory[0m [93mmultiple[0m [93mmyeloma[0m, [93mcentral[0m [93mnervous[0m [92msystem[0m [93mtumors[0m, and [93minflammatory[0m [93mbowel[0m [93mdisease[0m were among the [93mtop[0m [93mconditions[0m [93mtreated[0m, [93mvarying[0m by [93mage[0m [93mgroup[0m. [93mNotably[0m, [93m60[0m% of the [93mmost[0m [93mcommon[0m [93mtechnologies[0m ([93m13[0m out of [93muse[0m [93mprograms[0m [93mhave[0m [93maccelerated[0m [93mearly[0m [93maccess[0m to [93mnovel[0m [93mtherapies[0m for [93mcomplex[0m [93mconditions[0m and [93mprovided[0m a
